snippet: A look at some of the sites that were to be transformed had New York City been selected for this year's Summer Games, along with the official descriptions of what was envisioned there.
abstract: A look at some of the sites that were to be transformed had New York City been selected for this year's Summer Games, along with the official descriptions of what was envisioned there.

headline.main: Farewell to the Subway Olympics That Never Were
headline.print_headline: Revisiting Promises Of Olympics In the City
